plugins.name: Only_Webp
plugins.code: if not ngx.re.find(ngx.var.uri, '\\.webp$') then ngx.exit(ngx.HTTP_NOT_FOUND) end

plugins.name: Create_Webp
plugins.code: ngx.say('this is a webp file, believe')

plugins.name: Match_Webp_Or_Json
plugins.code: if not ngx.re.find(ngx.var.uri, '(\\.webp|\\.json)$') then ngx.exit(ngx.HTTP_NOT_FOUND) end

plugins.name: Authorized
plugins.code: if not ngx.var.arg_token == '0xcafe' then ngx.exit(ngx.HTTP_UNAUTHORIZED) end

plugins.name: Define_Upstream
plugins.code: if ngx.re.find(ngx.var.uri, '(\\.webp)$') then ngx.var.gateway_upstream = '127.0.0.1:8080' else ngx.var.gateway_upstream = '127.0.0.1:9090' end
